DOC.detailed_description: The standard emergency medical service ( EMS ) Germany consist two-tiered system ambulance ( paramedic ) prehospital EMS physician unit . For example , legal condition restrict opioid-based analgesia physician . Based pre-defined standard regional emergency dispatch center deploy kind emergency unit . In recent year telemedicine emerge complementary system EMS may provide remote medical expertise sustain even improve quality medical treatment on-scene . Particularly , base result project Med-on- @ ix TemRas ( telemedical rescue assistance system ) , emergency telemedical service gradually implement daily routine EMS city Aachen , Germany . In retrospective study quality adverse event analgesia telemedically support paramedic shall compare conventional treatment on-scene EMS physician EMS city Aachen , Germany .
